title: New York City Launches 'Day Of Action' To Educate Nail Salon Workers
teaser: New York City authorities Thursday launched a single "day of action" to educate nail salon operators, workers and customers about labor and immigration standards following a recent New York Times report on the widespread exploitation of undocumented immigrant workers in city salons.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
